Plot: Family guy Jack Sadelstein prepares for the annual event he dreads: the Thanksgiving visit of his twin sister, the needy and passive-aggressive Jill, who then refuses to leave.
Title: Jack and Jill
Writer: Steve Koren (screenplay), Adam Sandler (screenplay), Ben Zook (story)
Actors: Adam Sandler, Al Pacino, Katie Holmes, Elodie Tougne
tomatoConsensus: Although it features an inexplicably committed performance from Al Pacino, Jack and Jill is impossible to recommend on any level whatsoever.
